review: I had a Roku and after two years I discovered I was over 90% into Amazon's world. Why not go the next step and make that commitment --- to Amazon. This little gizmo is super fast compared to my Roku days. It's also super organized with a lot more help articles and videos. Amazon's packaging and promotion department goes all out. I thought I was getting some fine jewelry instead of a Fire TV box. KUDOS on the PR department. Except now I'm not sure I can recycle the box it came in. It's too pretty.
